fulltext:
Nguyen Duy Hao                                                                                  
Summary 
 
Eager to learn, high sense of responsibility and good communication. 
 
Having 2.5 years experienced in software development. 
 
Experienced in Ruby on Rails, Postgres, Golang, Javascript, HTML/CSS. 
 
Ability to work independently as well as in a team. 
Employment 
9/2017 – 3/2019           Web Development  at Larion 
 
Build layout, responsive with Javascript, HTML, CSS. 
 
Trouble shoot issues on production. 
 
Improve performance script load data. 
 
Training, review script optimize performance. 
 
Training on job for newbie debug on Chrome Devtools. 
 
Support team member trouble shoot problems. 
8/2016 – 8/2017           Web Development  at GMO Runsystem  
 
Development web by React, Redux. 
 
Training React, Redux for newbie. 
Project and work experience 
Healthcare  (2017)          Fullstack and Devops 
 
Solving problems related to load data heavy. 
 
Build smart tools for teammates to use. 
 
Check resources and detect problems on production. 
 
Overview Linux and OS, Process management. 
 
Overview architecture multi tenant. 
 
Responsive and customize web pages by pure JS. 
 
Optimize script Ruby and SQL. 
                                        Languages/ Technologies:  
 
RoR, Golang, Bash, Postgresql, Solr. 
 
Javascript, HTML, CSS. 
eCommerce (2017)        Frontend  
 
Build core for system eCommerce. 
 
Overview on ES6 and ReactJS/ Redux. 
Languages/ Technologies: React/Redux, ES6. 
Skills 
Platforms                       Linux, Windows, Docker. 
Editors                            Emacs, CodePen. 
Softwares                      Chrome devtools, Postman, postgres cli, Git, SVN, Jenkins. 
Others                           Have some experience in networking, regular expression, tools 
                                such as: grep, tail, head, screen, sort, cut, df, du, htop, iotop. 
Education 
2009 – 2014                   University of Technical Education Ho Chi Minh City. 
                                       Major: Information Technology.
